Matrix3d metapod::Spatial::RotationMatrixAboutZ::operator* ( const Matrix3d &  A) const [inline]

Optimized multiplication of the rotation matrix with a general 3x3 matrix.

The total number of operations is 12m + 6a.
Matrix3d = RotationMatrixAboutZ * Matrix3d
